>
>Just retested the Extreme level:  Error message was 'Weapon 14
>(something) random'.

Okay .. probably "Weapon 14 doing act-random" -- since Weapon 14 is 
"Family_Wave2", this means that somewhere on your level, you have one of 
those translucent "archmage energy wave" weapons sitting around.  Once the 
level begins, it doesn't know what to do during its "action" phase.

Try to scroll around to see if you see it -- although it'd be really hard 
to spot when the screen is still, it should show up (kind of a "glimmering" 
area) if you're scrolling the screen around.

--Tom
